channel.title: Problems: tor-internet-time sync
channel.description:
Imported Workstation and Gateway appliances into Virtualbox (host OS: Ubuntu 17.04 [internet connection is fine, tor browser works fine]). Got all the way to update and dist-upgrade: all went well. Whonixcheck failed. "ping google.com" yields: "unknown host". Both clocks are very wrong (Gateway: about 24 hours behind my time; Workstation: about 7 hours behind).
Tried right-clicking the clocks to "restart sdwdate - instantly adjust the time" - no luck, still way off.
So my big problems are that I don't appear to be connected to the internet, the clocks are way off, and consequently the "tor bootstrap" test keeps failing. Any tips or tricks? Thanks.

item.title: Problems: tor-internet-time sync
item.dc:creator: HectorCyzyl
item.description:
The “clock fix” thing worked perfectly. Everything is going along swimmingly now! Thanks for the tip. Appreciate your help.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems: tor-internet-time sync
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
HI Segalla

I got my thoughts crossed. ping uses ICMP. Thank you for pointing that out. Post has been corrected.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems: tor-internet-time sync
item.dc:creator: Segalla
item.description:
0brand:

Tor does not support UDP so ping will not work

Since when is ping using UDP?

Read full topic

item.title: Problems: tor-internet-time sync
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi HecorCyzyl

ping will not work from Whonix-gateway. You are referring to using ping in whonix-gateway correct?

If you haven’t already you can use the troubleshooting guide to fix your clock.

https://whonix.org/wiki/Troubleshooting#Clock_Fix

Use this site as a reference to set UTC time.

https://timeanddate.com/worldclock/timezone/utc

EDIT: Did you verify the Whonix images?

Whonix

VirtualBox/Verify the virtual machine images using the command line

Instructions for OpenPGP Verification of Whonix using Command Line

Can you post the error message output of whonixcheck --verbose

Read full topic

item.title: Problems: tor-internet-time sync
item.dc:creator: HectorCyzyl
item.description:
Imported Workstation and Gateway appliances into Virtualbox (host OS: Ubuntu 17.04 [internet connection is fine, tor browser works fine]). Got all the way to update and dist-upgrade: all went well. Whonixcheck failed. “ping google.com” yields: “unknown host”. Both clocks are very wrong (Gateway: about 24 hours behind my time; Workstation: about 7 hours behind).

Tried right-clicking the clocks to “restart sdwdate - instantly adjust the time” - no luck, still way off.

So my big problems are that I don’t appear to be connected to the internet, the clocks are way off, and consequently the “tor bootstrap” test keeps failing. Any tips or tricks? Thanks.
